name: swensi-nakonde-terminal
description: Swensi Nakonde - Trade & Transport Logistics Link

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build/components && cp index.html manifest.json sw.js metadata.json build/ && cp *.tsx build/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp *.ts build/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r components/* build/components/ 2>/dev/null || true
